trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the binary format of a custom attribute is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的二進位格式無效時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `CustomAttributeFormatException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_FORMAT which has the value 0x80131537.
trans-unit.target: `CustomAttributeFormatException`會使用 HRESULT COR_E_FORMAT 0x80131537 的值。

trans-unit.source: `CustomAttributeFormatException` is thrown if a custom attribute on a data type is formatted incorrectly, possibly because of a bug in the tool used to create the data type.
trans-unit.target: `CustomAttributeFormatException`如果資料類型的自訂屬性的格式不正確，可能是因為用來建立資料類型的工具中的錯誤，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of `CustomAttributeFormatException` with an empty message string and the root cause exception set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的執行個體`CustomAttributeFormatException`具有空的訊息字串和根會造成例外狀況設`null`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as follows: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|null| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("").|
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性`Exception`物件，如下所示: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| null | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字串 ("")。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>類別具有指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the Exception object as follows: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`|
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可設定的例外狀況物件的屬性，如下所示: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`|</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason this exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 訊息指出的原因，此例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>類別具有指定的序列化和內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The data for serializing or deserializing the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 用於序列化或還原序列化的自訂屬性的資料。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 來源和目的地自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>.</xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The `inner` exception.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`inner`例外狀況。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
